mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mammography X-ray tube
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: AEG Aktiengesellschaft [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Single purpose X-ray tube. One of the labels reads "AEG X-Ray Tube Type: MBM 60, Serial No.: 710864, Manuf.: Berlin, Mar. 1987, Made in Germany." This item was given in honor of Theodore E. Keats, M.D., F.A.C.R., Chair of the UVa Department of Radiology from 1963-1991.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
Donated by Dr. Daniel L. Seale [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments or apparatus--X-rays--Equipment and supplies
